column1: Smoque BBQ////UPDATE: As of my initial review I hadn't yet tried the ribs or chicken
column2: but we just ordered carry-out last night and got to sample the St. Louis ribs and the smoked chicken.  Both were out of this world good -- and now that I've tried both sauces I can say they're both wonderful.  Thus
column3: despite any misgivings about the ambience of the restaurant
column4: I am compelled to upgrade from 4 stars to 5 stars!
